AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Immoral Fabrication
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a void spawn. The source of [PAWN_nameDef] has been forgotten in myth.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Empty Bliss
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: "An empty bliss beyond this world"\n\nWhen [PAWN_nameDef] pay for a illusory thing, it will trigger a deep internal emptiness in someone.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Blurring Nebula
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: "A speed even further beyond light"\n\nWe have a internal fear of getting fall behind. Soon [PAWN_nameDef] will come and slaughter all people who fall behind, faster than light...

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Burning Aches
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: "A inferior fabrication by nameless painters"\n\nA nameless painter looked at [PAWN_nameDef] and said: All works which not famous, are just wastepapers... Then he commited suicide.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Raging Battle
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: "A lost battle is raging"\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] is always struggle with something which mankind don't understand. [PAWN_nameDef] is always a photon ripper...

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Uninteractable Despair
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: "A rotten corpse which not ever be seen by 3000 years"\n\nNo one know [PAWN_nameDef]. No one will remember [PAWN_nameDef] when it die. No one will even notice its death except his best friend, maggots and flies.
